info.task: navigate forwards to collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed disclosure button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the navigation region. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the navigation region. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
